title: Roasted vegetable stack with griddled halloumi cheese
description: This seasonal vegetarian barbecue recipe is perfect for entertaining as it's easy to scale up or down.
ingredients: 1 x 200ml/7fl oz pot low-fat crème fraîche
½ handful fresh mint, finely chopped
½ ruby grapefruit, juice and flesh
salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
1 each red, green, and yellow sweet peppers, quartered, seeds removed
